nl.corebooster.setup

Class TriggerBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.corebooster.setup.TriggerBox

  • public class TriggerBox
extends java.lang.Object
    Describes an trigger box. When the player collides with a trigger box, an event will start
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Raymon de Looff, Thijs Clowting, Richard Weug

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

      static class  TriggerBox.TriggerType

      Constructs a new trigger box with a specific type and value

    • Constructor Detail

      • TriggerBox

        public TriggerBox(java.lang.String objectName,
                  TriggerBox.TriggerType type,
                  int triggerDirection,
                  int alternateX,
                  int alternateY,
                  java.lang.String value,
                  int x,
                  int y,
                  int width,
                  int height,
                  int boxMargin)
        Constructs a new trigger box with a specific type and value
        Parameters:
        objectName - Name of the corresponding object
        type - The type of trigger: SCENESWITCH, BORDER_SCENESWITCH, LOCKEDSCENESWITCH, MESSAGE, LOCKEDMESSAGE, TRADEINSUPPLY, TRAPDOOR, ITEM
        triggerDirection - The direction the player has to approach from for the trigger to work
        alternateX - The x position to use if the normal position is blocked
        alternateY - The y position to use if the normal position is blocked
        value - The value of the trigger
        x - The initial x position of the trigger box
        y - The initial y position of the trigger box
        width - The width of the trigger box
        height - The height of the trigger box
        boxMargin - The margin of the trigger box

        public boolean isTriggering(org.newdawn.slick.geom.Rectangle boxToCheck)
        Returns true if the given shape is triggering this trigger box
        Parameters:
        boxToCheck - The shape to check triggering with
        Returns:
        Whether or not the two shapes collide and therefore trigger, true/false
